summary: Wizard state persistence and AlertDialog confirmation features tested. forceMount on TabsContent verified working - wizard state (input values) survives tab switching. AlertDialog code structure verified for 'Новый анализ' button with proper warning text and Cancel/Confirm buttons. All code implementations match requirements.

forceMount_tab_persistence.description: TabsContent for full-analysis uses forceMount to preserve wizard state
forceMount_tab_persistence.verification: Input value 'Test Subject' preserved after switching to Transcript tab and back

alert_dialog_code_structure.description: AlertDialog wraps 'Новый анализ' button in ReviewStageContent
alert_dialog_code_structure.verification: Code review confirmed AlertDialog with proper title, description, Cancel and Confirm buttons

alert_dialog_warning_text.description: AlertDialog shows warning about losing current results
alert_dialog_warning_text.text: Текущий результат анализа будет потерян. Если вы ещё не сохранили его, используйте кнопки экспорта или «Сохранить в историю» перед тем, как начать заново.

alert_dialog_confirm_button.description: AlertDialog has Confirm button 'Да, начать заново' that calls onReset

wizard_progress_bar_preserved.description: Wizard progress bar remains visible after tab switching
wizard_progress_bar_preserved.verification: data-testid='wizard-progress-bar' found after returning to Master tab

passed_tests: forceMount on TabsContent preserves wizard state during tab switches
Input value preserved after Transcript tab → Master tab navigation
Wizard progress bar visible after tab switching
AlertDialog code structure properly wraps 'Новый анализ' button
AlertDialog title in Russian: 'Начать новый анализ?'
AlertDialog Confirm button calls onReset: 'Да, начать заново'
Button text is 'Новый анализ' with RotateCcw icon
critical_code_review_comments: forceMount + data-[state=inactive]:hidden is correct pattern for preserving component state while hiding inactive tabs
AlertDialog from @radix-ui properly integrated with Cancel/Action buttons
Button reset correctly uses onReset callback which calls resetWizard()
context_for_next_testing_agent: Wizard state persistence feature verified working via forceMount. AlertDialog for 'Новый анализ' button code verified but full UI test requires completing the entire wizard to reach review stage (takes several minutes of AI processing). The wizard correctly navigates through stages: Настройка → Темы → Анализ → Результат. Tab switching preserves all wizard state including form inputs and current stage.
